puzzle.title: Mnemosyne's Journey
puzzle.notes: Note: Do not print this puzzle! One of these pictures is an animated GIF and the puzzle will be unsolvable if printed.
puzzle.hint: Mnemosyne has collected an object from each of the eight characters around her. Figure out which object belongs to which character.

The objects in order belong to:
- Minotaur - Golden Fleece - Prometheus - Pegasus - Pandora - Atlas - Cyclops - Medusa
The number in the red circle indicates the index of the letter you need from each word.

The animated graphic sequentially adds one item from each picture, allowing us to create an order of eight myths:
- Minotaur - Golden Fleece - Prometheus - Pegasus - Pandora - Atlas - Cyclops - Medusa
The animated graphic also gives a sequence of numbers, which can be indexed into the names:
- 1 - M - 9 - E - 4 - M - 2 - E - 3 - N - 2 - T - 5 - O - 5 - S
The puzzle solution is MEMENTOS.
